comments.content: For me , spicy cuisines are acceptable. but pig brains? rabbit heads?? I don't want to try them at all. how horrible they are! ⊙_⊙

You like so much Bizarre Foods with Andrew Zimmern, I think you should be Bizarre Foods with Andrew Zimmern of loyal audience! I hear you said "when I saw it in my first sight”, I know you are very much in love these Bizarre Foods, I guess that you should be very fun. I really admire your courage to eat those Bizarre Foods but I have no courage to eat them.

please don't get me wrong guys. I'm a fan of hot & spicy food. But rabbit heads and those scary ones Andrew tried in front of Cameras. Way bizarre and beyond my toleration... besides... some are really forbidden for my health condition now. My uric acid is still killing me
